name: SetServiceCustomFieldValues
description:
Update custom field values for a specific service.

Use this tool to set custom field values for a specific service in PagerDuty. It requires the scoped OAuth `services.write` permission.

parameters.name: service_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the service whose custom field values need to be updated.

parameters.name: accept_header_versioning
parameters.description: The version of the API to accept, used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the request. Typically 'application/json'.

parameters.name: custom_field_values
parameters.description: JSON object containing an array of custom field values to update for the service.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
